alert.note: Alert for Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hertford, and northern Gates Counties and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 730 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Murfreesboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Chowan University, Suffolk, Gates, Como, Roduco, Whaleyville, Eure, Easons Crossroads, Savage, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Drum Hill, Hazelton, Buckland, Dort, Somerton, Riddicksville and Bartonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
